name: stjude-epitope
title: Neoepitope Prediction (St. Jude)
summary: Predict affinity of epitopes generated by missense mutation or gene fusion

inputSpec.name: SNV_or_fusion
inputSpec.label: SNV or fusion
inputSpec.help: Please input SNV or fusion (default SNV)

inputSpec.name: Peptide_size
inputSpec.label: Peptide size
inputSpec.help: Please provide peptide size flanking mutations (default: 9; NOTE: the size need to be between 8 and 15.)

inputSpec.name: Affinity_threshold
inputSpec.label: Affinity threshold
inputSpec.help: Please provide highlight threshold for affinity (default: 500)

inputSpec.name: hla_allele
inputSpec.label: HLA allele
inputSpec.help: Please provide HLA alleles seperated by tab. The 1st column has to be sample names matching to the mutation file names. Columns following 1st columns are HLA class I alleles to be tested. e.g. Sample1    HLA-A02:01    HLA-A23:01
